Nerangs.ab: ... īšanąm drujəm. hōm ud urwarām kōftan ud hāwan škāftan zōhr andar kardan pad hōm pālā kardan kē abar sar ī ǰīwdān ēstēd
"At ... īšanąm drujəm, he should strike the hōm and urwarām and hit the hāwan. He should pour zōhr in it and throw (the mix) into the hōm pālā that is next to the ǰīwdān."
... īšanąm drujəm ēn gyāg hōm ud urwarām kōftan ud zōhr andar kardan andar hōm pālā kardan
"... īšanąm drujəm. At this passage, he should strike the hōm and urwarām and pour zōhr in them and throw (the mix) into the hōm pālā."
... īšanąm drujəm. ēn gyāg hōm ud urwarām kōftan
"... īšanąm drujəm. At this passage, he should strike the hōm and urwarām."
